Posts.EditableText: Hello I recently tried to publish my game as a game that everyone can view but even though I selected "everybody" and pressed "update" when I went to check on my game listing it said it was STILL UNLISTED. I've tried changing it again several times but for some reason it never changes. Is this like normal? Is it because of my wifi or something?
Posts.HTML: Hello I recently tried to publish my game as a game that everyone can view but even though I selected "everybody" and pressed "update" when I went to check on my game listing it said it was STILL UNLISTED. I've tried changing it again several times but for some reason it never changes. Is this like normal? Is it because of my wifi or something?
